attributes.action: make it obligatory to recycle (all local councils having provided appropiate collection facilities) by business and private premises alike, with heavy additions to council tax to those who don't adhere to the policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is everyone's responsibility to recycle and councils should provide the means to do so to homes and businesses alike.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
